/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, and buildings that stand tall against the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sun casts its warm glow on the scene, creating a play of light and shadow that adds depth to the image. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image exudes a sense of vibrancy and life, as if waiting for the city's inhabitants to start their day.
